overview: Working out has never been this fun!  Ennio is at the gym toning is arms while Just Angelo watches from the side. That entire arm pumping Ennio was doing also got a big something else hard. Enzo hires a personal trainer to help him get back into shape. Tomm pushes Enzo till his body shines from sweet man sweat. What Enzo doesn’t know is that Tomm just loves a sweaty buff boy. While taking in the sun John asks Max if he can oil him up because is skin is getting dry. Max starts at the top and goes lower and lower till he finds something hard at the bottom. While having a boxing lesson things start to heat up between Joseph and Danny. A little fun hitting turns into some steamy one on one bare action. James gets back home from a hard workout session with a kink in his neck. Timmi offers to rub it out for him, but that’s not the only thing that he rubs out.
title: Buff Boys
